name: Tohoku Zunko and Friends Special Limited Edition NFT

metadata.name: #001 Tohoku Zunko Limited Edition NFT Special Cards with Serial Numbers
metadata.description:
Now you can have Tohoku Zunko and her friends all to yourself! ＼（♥ず・ω・だ♥）／ 
Using the latest in NFT technology we have digitally created Zunko and her friends into one-and-only rare cards as a ‘Tohoku Zunko and Friends Special Limited Edition NFT’ set. The set includes the 3 sisters, Tohoku Zunko, Tohoku Itako, and Tohoku Kiritan. Make sure to jump on the chance to own these one-and-only limited edition cards o(≧▽≦)o 

・The copyright and trademark of the characters belong to SSS LLC. Rights for creating derivative works and merchandising are permitted by following set guidelines. 
 ・Owners have digital ownership and rights to publish on social media. (Within the limits of the general principles of public order and morality).
